scripts.dev: npm run build:sub-project && npm run cp:sub-project:main-project && npm run dev --workspace=main-project
scripts.build: npm run build:sub-project && npm run cp:sub-project:main-project && npm run build --workspace=main-project
scripts.preview: npm run build:sub-project && npm run cp:sub-project:main-project && npm run preview --workspace=main-project
